test:
.power Vdd=1
.thresholds Vol=0 Vil=0.1 Vih=0.9 Voh=1

.group inputs STALL D
.group outputs Q

.mode gate

.cycle CLK=1 tran 1n assert inputs tran 49n CLK=0 assert inputs tran 50n sample outputs 

   0  1  -  // LE=1; D=1 .. init
   0  1  1  // LE=1; D=1 .. Q=D 
   1  0  1  // LE=0; D=0 .. Q output latched in.
   1  -  1  // LE=0; D goes undefined, Q should be good.
   0  0  1  // LE=1; D=0 .. Q still latched from last clk.
   1  -  0  // LE=0; D undefined, Q should be good.

.plot CLK
.plot D
.plot Q
